biweekly.io

Class WriteContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • biweekly.io.WriteContext

  • public class WriteContext
extends Object
    Stores information used to write the properties in an iCalendar object.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt

    • Constructor Summary

      • addDate

        public void addDate(ICalDate date,
           boolean floating,
           TimeZone tz)
        Records the timezoned date-time values that are being written. This is used to generate a DAYLIGHT property for vCalendar objects.
        Parameters:
        floating - true if the date is floating, false if not
        tz - the timezone to format the date in or null for UTC
        date - the date value
